title.quote: Proclaim the Lord's death until he comes

para.emphasis: “Do this in remembrance of me.” .... For every time you eat this bread and drink the cup, you proclaim the Lord’s death until he comes.

para.quote: Do this in remembrance of me.

chapter.para: What did Jesus want us to do in remembrance of him? In order to really understand this, we must first look at exactly what Jesus and the disciples did that last supper. Then we need to ask, What did the early disciples undersand Jesus to mean?

The following outline describes what happened, and was produced simply by harmonizing what all of the Gospels and 1 Corinthians say about the Last Supper. After briefly observing what happened, according to all the gospel writers and Paul, we will ask, What did they understand Jesus to mean when he asked us to do this in remembrance of him? and What are the implications of this for us?

sect1.title: A harmony of the Last Supper
